title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
short_cast: Sacha Baron Cohen, Eddie Redmayne, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Jeremy Strong, Mark Rylance, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Michael Keaton, Frank Langella, John Carroll Lynch, Alex Sharp, John Doman, Ben Shenkman
cast: Sacha Baron Cohen, Eddie Redmayne, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Jeremy Strong, Mark Rylance, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Michael Keaton, Frank Langella, John Carroll Lynch, Alex Sharp, John Doman, Ben Shenkman
genre: Social Issue Dramas, Courtroom Movies, Movies Based on Real Life, US Movies, Dramas
desc: What was supposed to be a peaceful protest turned into a violent clash with the police. What followed was one of the most notorious trials in history.
